message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500.
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000.
I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000, Bob. I think it's worth more than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11200.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $10000. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
I understand you're firm on $10000, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10800.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to pay more than $10000. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
